name: Facebook Newsfeed Eradicator for Safari
tagline: Lets you use Facebook without being distracted by the newsfeed.
body:
## Newsfeed Eradicator for Safari.
Newsfeed eradicator blocks the distracting tempting Facebook newsfeed. Newsfeed eradicator for Chrome was originally created by Jordwest [Open Source](https://github.com/jordwest/news-feed-eradicator). 

I used the Chrome extension a lot, but I like safari for it's power management. I did not replace the newsfeed with quotes as they got annoying after a while. It removes the newsfeed.

Download here: [Safari Extension](https://github.com/AntonOsika/newsfeed-eradicator/blob/master/Newsfeed-Eradicator.safariextz?raw=true)

### Support
Please mail me any opinions anton.osika@gmail.com, or submit them as issues here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
